title: Detective Conan: Shadows of Deception
premise: In the cold streets of London, Conan embarks on a thrilling chase to unravel the mystery behind a violent robbery that led to the tragic death of a notorious drug dealer. With danger at every turn, can Conan outwit a ruthless team of criminals before they strike again?

shotlist.description: Aerial view of London at night, the city lights illuminate the scene.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Aerial view of London at night, showing the city lights and dark, sprawling streets.

voice_over.text: London, a city where shadows hide more than just secrets.

character.name: Conan
character.description: A high school detective turned into a child by a mysterious organization.

shotlist.description: Close-up of a newspaper headline reading 'Mysterious Death Shocks North London', with Conan observing it.
shotlist.image_generation_prompt: Close-up of a newspaper with a headline about a mysterious death, held by a child detective, with curiosity in his eyes.

voice_over.text: A sudden death, a mystery unfolds.
